sentences.sContent: The thieves stole a purse containing bank-notes.
sentences.sCn: 小偷们偷到了一个里面有钞票的钱包。

sentences.sContent: The museum contains a number of original artworks.
sentences.sCn: 这家博物馆藏有一些原创艺术品。

sentences.sContent: ...There are still some public lands that contain oil...
...Foods must not contain too much sugar or salt...
...but the ones that contain a lot of fat and sugar will slow you down later...
...Meals must contain a variety of foods with plenty of grains and at least one fruit or vegetable each day...
...A hot lunch can contain up to 30% fat...

synos.tran: 包含；控制；容纳；牵制（敌军）

words.tran: 泰然自若的，从容的；被控制的
包含；遏制（contain的过去分词）；容纳

trans.tranOther: if something such as a bag, box, or place contains something, that thing is inside it
